title: 74/578/Euratom: Commission Decision of 13 November 1974 amending the Decision of 13 January 1971 with regard to the place of work of the Director-General of the Joint Nuclear Research Centre (JRC) and its departments
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 November 1974  amending the Decision of 13 January 1971 with regard to the place of work of the Director-General of the Joint Nuclear Research Centre (JRC) and its departments  (74/578/Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 3 (2) of the Commission Decision of 13 January 1971 shall be amended as follows:
"Brussels is the place of work of the Director-General and the departments directly attached to him."
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 November 1974.
For the Commission
The President
François-Xavier ORTOLI
(1)OJ No L 16, 20.1.1971, p. 14.
